overview: After telling Luke Reed he has an injury, Michael Del Ray starts giving him a massage. He feels a protruding bulge in Luke's pants, and he laughs, asking him if he's hard. They kiss on the sofa and quickly make their way to Luke's bedroom. Ryan Jordan asks his roommate if he'd like to fuck him. He takes his silence as a yes and pulls him closer, and Jackson Traynor does not resist. Ryan throws him onto the bed and sucks him off, stroking himself in the process. Chris Blades enters Charlie Pattinson's room to find him in bed pretending to be tired, but when he rouses Charlie's covers, he instead finds his roommate naked and ready for action. Johnny Hill intends on taking his sweet time before snatching Dominic Green's cherry. Dominic's sweet sucker is already unwrapped for Johnny, so he helps himself to a nice long lick.
title: More Than Friends
